_header: This cross that here painted is
_description: Text attached to a picture of the Rood of Bromholm

CamFitz55.Transcription:
Thys cros that heyr peyntyd isSyng of the cros of bromholm
                    is
CamFitz55.Note:
Written onto right and left sides of frame around illustration of the
                    cross of Bromholm.
CamFitz55.Editions:
James,  Montague Rhodes. 
             A Descriptive Catalogue of Manuscripts in the Fitzwilliam
                Museum.
         Cambridge: at the UP, 1895: 139.
